vibesExplanation:
The workout is best classified as 'The Reboot Workout' based on its focus on gentle, full-body stretching, which is described as suitable for daily practice. This vibe reflects a low-stress, refreshing approach to movement, evidenced by the description mentioning joint mobility, posture, and gentle exercises that can be done every day. The score of 0.9 reflects a strong alignment with this vibe.

The workout also aligns with 'The Comfort Moves' due to its appeal to beginners and emphasis on safe, feel-good movement, as highlighted by the words 'gentle,' 'beginners,' and user comments appreciating the non-frustrating nature of the routine. The user feedback emphasizes feeling cared for and comforted, justifying the score of 0.8.

'Zen Flow' is also a relevant vibe as the workout includes breath-centered movements, as indicated by the description and echoed in comments about mental relaxation and personal reflection. This vibe scores 0.6 as fluid and intentional breathing is part of the session, but it is not the primary focus compared to stretching and comfort elements.
